channel.title: Whats your honest opinion?
channel.description:
Im working on my first server ever and im trying to make it unique from the other server so I had an idea. My idea is that people will chop trees and money will come out, not very much though only 10k every once and awile, but thats not the idea the idea was I would make shops with basically all the items and I would price them high so it would take time to save up for your dream items. I had this idea so a partyhat would look nice when you saw it on someones head because on other servers everyone seems to have all the good items it kind of makes you get bored really fast.
What do you think?
Thankyou

item.title: Whats your honest opinion?
item.dc:creator: @Prozon Prozon
item.description:
@Prozon wrote:

This seems like kind of an odd idea… I’ll have to vote no.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your honest opinion?
item.dc:creator: @Fireskrit Fireskrit
item.description:
@Fireskrit wrote:

Lol no-one has actually said if they like it or not atm… just a bunch of flame/hate mail.

I actually like that idea but maybe it would be best to situate the shops around the world in the game so that when they finally do have enough money it will take them time to get from one place to another rather than have all the shops “conveniantly” placed in Varrock.

Hope this is helpful!!

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your honest opinion?
item.dc:creator: @pimpownage pimpownage
item.description:
@pimpownage wrote:

well bug arent you just an ASSHOLE. he’s asking for your support and what you think of his ideas. give him some respect.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats your honest opinion?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Er why shop’s, npc drops would be better as they are harder to get

item.title: Whats your honest opinion?
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

well one, the “idea” of having money come out of the trees has been around for a while and its in many servers, second…a lot of servers have rare items hard to get and training + money making more difficult to get up…
